PT Thank you
+DW Thanks man, btw nicely done, I gave you a +1!
Hello, I haven't tried many. I'm currently using Camtasia 8.0 to record and edit.
+DM Thank you! :D
+Photoshop Tutorials subbed you are great dude awesome videos GOLD :))
+MA Glad you subbed, thank you very much!! :)
+AS Thanks sir! That's great to hear. Also I'm glad you found it helpful. :D
+J You're welcome, glad you like it. :D
+M No problem, thanks as well!
+VM Sorry about the late reply. But the font I used is called "bebas neue"

Cool man, but it is properly called Typeface in the world of graphic design and typography. In addition, "font" is really a generic term, because each Typeface family has different fonts and fonts refer to size and such. Just thought I share my little bit of knowledge with you. Letter Type was very close though! ;-)
+PS Sure thing man, thanks!
+TNS Thanks man! Sorry about the late reply. But the font I used is called "bebas neue"
+VA Thanks for liking and subbing. :)
+JT Thank you very much, I'm glad you like them. :)

Here is a suggestion for photoshop lightroom users. You can not create layer in lightroom. I would recommend people to not to use it.
Number of fonts for CS5 version is very low. I would suggest people to download more fonts
For my CS3 photoshop restarting solves the probplem most of the time. And if you are using pirated version my suggestion is to restart when ever you have a problem.
There are some other options inside satin in Photoshop CC. I have got some great results from those option. I would recommend to use those!
People should try increasing the noise in outer glow. It gives a really cool result in Photoshop CS5.
There are lots of other brushes and styles in latest Photoshop CC. Try those out! I got really cool results!
I would recommend to use ctrl+T for transfrom. Sometimes it is difficult to find the transform command
When creating new layer make sure to unlock it! otherwise you wont get any result!!
I tried shadow option! the result was awesome! People should try that option too!
I would recommend to use other fonts like comic sans! that gives kool output!
